speaker: President. −
english: President. − The next item is the report by Gabriele Albertini, on behalf of the Committee on Transport and Tourism, on sustainable European transport policy, taking into account European energy and environment policies ( 2007/2147(INI) ) ( A6-0014/2008 ).
